title: Can Trump really rename the Gulf of Mexico? It could happen.
shortDescription: The Gulf of Mexico has been known by many names over the years. Renaming it could cause navigational issues for international sailors.

title: From Greenland to the Gulf of Mexico, Trump calls for sweeping changes
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump said at a news conference that he plans to make sweeping changes to U.S. policy when he's inaugurated on Jan. 20.

title: Trudeau claps back at Donald Trump's Canadian annexation comments
shortDescription: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau responded to continuing threats of annexation from President-elect Trump on Tuesday. Trudeau, along with other leaders.

title: Who owns Greenland? Trump's interest in buying Arctic island grows
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump has continued to float the idea of buying Greenland, a territory of Denmark. Here's what to know.

title: President Jimmy Carter lying in state at Capitol
shortDescription: Carter’s body will lie in state in the Capitol Rotunda until a funeral service at the National Cathedral in Washington on January 9. Carter, the 39th President of the United States, died at the age of 100 on December 29, 2024 at his home in Plains, Georgia.

title: No, Trump wasn't banned from Panama | Fact check
shortDescription: Panama has announced no such ban. The claim originated as satire.

title: How to pass his agenda? Trump leaves it up to GOP leaders in Congress
shortDescription: The House and Senate each have their own challenge in passing Trump's agenda through their chamber.

title: Trump pledges 'major pardons' for Jan. 6 rioters
shortDescription: Donald Trump said during a press conference that he will make “major pardons” for Jan. 6 defendants who stormed the Capitol four years ago.

title: Trump: NATO countries should more than double their required payment
shortDescription: The transatlantic alliance reached a milestone in 2024 when all non-U.S. NATO allies spent the 2% target on average for the first time.

title: Trump warns of consequences if Gaza hostages not released
shortDescription: Trump's Middle East envoy Steve Witkoff said on Tuesday he hopes to have good things to say about hostages held by Hamas in Gaza by Inauguration Day.

title: Trump won't rule out military force to acquire Greenland, Panama Canal
shortDescription: Trump would not rule out military force to acquire Greenland and the Panama Canal but said he hopes the US can annex Canada through "economic force."

title: Trump vows to rename Gulf of Mexico
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump told reporters he plans to rename the Gulf of Mexico the "Gulf of America."

title: Gulf of America? Trump says he'll rename 'Gulf of Mexico'
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump said would rename the Gulf of Mexico the "Gulf of America" during a Mar-a-Lago news conference.

title: Two death row inmates reject Biden's clemency
shortDescription: Shannon Wayne Agofsky and Len Davis both filed emergency petitions prevent their death sentences from being commuted to life in prison without parole.

title: Judge rejects Trump's request to delay sentencing | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: A Louisiana patient has died from bird flu. A judge holds Rudy Giuliani in contempt in a Georgia election worker defamation case.

title: Watch live: Trump set to hold press conference at Mar-a-Lago
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump was set to hold a news conference from his Mar-a-Lago club on Tuesday morning. Here's how to watch live.

title: Judge denies Trump appeal to postpone sentencing in NY hush money case
shortDescription: An appeals judge rejected Trump's request to postpone sentencing Friday after he argued he should be shielded by presidential immunity.

title: Trump Jr. arrives in Greenland after father reiterates interest
shortDescription: Donald Trump Jr.'s visit to Nuuk, Greenland, was expected to last four to five hours on Tuesday. No meetings were scheduled with government officials.

title: 'Peaceful transfer of power': Mike Pence commends VP Harris, Congress
shortDescription: Pence took to X, formerly Twitter, to share his praise to Congress and VP Harris for the peaceful transfer of power concerning Trump's election certification.

title: Judge blocks release of special counsel report about Trump's cases
shortDescription: Special counsel Jack Smith was finalizing his report about Trump's two indictments for release as early as Friday if the judge hadn't blocked it.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump is certified...and set to be sentenced.
shortDescription: Trump's victory is official — but he still faces sentencing in a hush money case this week. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.

title: Biden to visit California desert, create new national monuments
shortDescription: While tribal, federal, state, officials expected to attend event are lauding move, President-elect Trump threatens to reverse course.

title: Jimmy Carter's remains arrive at US Capitol in dramatic farewell
shortDescription: The remains of President Jimmy Carter arrived in Washington on Tuesday. His funeral is set for Thursday, also declared a National Day of Mourning.

title: Biden tells New Orleans 'you are not alone' during visit after attack
shortDescription: President Biden told a grieving New Orleans "you are not alone" as the nation stands with the city following the deadly New Year's Day attack.
